choice.CLAENGINE: Check our timesheet evaluator for collective labor rules
choice.FREELANCER: Check our online software for timesheets and invoice management
choice.HIRER: View our integration service for Flex clients
choice.INTERIM: Check our online software for Time Registration and invoicing
choice.MENU-FREELANCER: Online software for timesheets and invoice management
choice.MENU-SOFTWARE: Online software for timesheets and invoice management
choice.SUPPLIER: View our integration service for Temp staffing/Consulting firm

cookie.BANNER_TEXT: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. We do this by keeping track of the parts of the site that you visit, so we get a better understanding of how to be of assistance. This cookies are only accessed when you re-enter our website. We do not track or otherwise leverage this data when you are not on our website.

database.LOG_IN_INTRO: Only an admin can see this page.

error.SUBTITLE: We couldn't find the page you where looking for.

freelancer.HERO_TEXT: Shouldn’t it all be about the quality of your hours? Administrating them should just be automated.
freelancer.INTRO_SUBTITLE: So why would you waste your energy on managing timesheets and chasing invoices?
freelancer.INTRO_TEXT: FlexForceMonkey does not just offer software for time registration, we offer a platform that was inspired from cooperation between customer and supplier. So here you do not just make a timesheet, with this software you can control and communicate this time with your customer directly. And that is available in the standard solution.
freelancer.INTRO_TITLE: Self-employed or global player, your dream should be content-based work
freelancer.REGISTER_ACCOUNT: REGISTER NOW FOR AN ONLINE ACCOUNT
freelancer.TRY_NOW: JOIN NOW AND REGISTER YOUR ACCOUNT
freelancer.TRY_SUBTITLE: We consider all time&material business as equals. So whether you are freelancing or running a 1.000 resources in an online business, you are a FlexForceMonkey.
freelancer.TRY_SUBTITLE_2: In the end, everyone should benefit, right?
freelancer.TRY_TEXT: We believe in the future of flex work. We see it as the fabric that holds our economic future together and we have the dream of bringing a little more efficiency, transparency and fairness into that game. It is our strategy that the entire flex industry will be online and connected, so we offer a low threshold and scalable cost.
freelancer.TRY_TITLE: A free basic account and high scalability?
freelancer.WORK_TEXT: Register now for a company account and trust on the advantages of FlexForceMonkey:
freelancer.WORK_TEXT_ITEM1: Just invite your clients to your account, we will do the rest
freelancer.WORK_TEXT_ITEM3: Subscription fee of € 1,50 per weekly / € 5,- per monthly timesheet per client
freelancer.WORK_TEXT_ITEM4: Always get the first 25 weekly / 5 monthy timesheets per month for free
freelancer.WORK_TEXT_ITEM5: Internal timesheets are always included and for free
freelancer.WORK_TITLE: Online software for time registration and invoicing

hirer.CONNECT: Connect with your purchasing system or HR process
hirer.CONNECT_SUBTITLE: A complete menu of connectivity options  standardizes your optimization for integration.
hirer.CONNECT_TEXT: The most special thing about FlexForceMonkey is that it is not very demanding on your system. Whether you want to shop with us from a catalog buying process via punch-out, or you require a data feed as HR master data. Whether you want to participate with or without a time registration system. We have a combinable solution for all common choices. And we connect your supplier(s) for you following the digital desires they have. We think that is simple online collaboration.
hirer.GET_KIT: Contact us now for your first supplier integration
hirer.HERO_TEXT: So your dream is about a fully digitized chain? Process purchase and sales transactions for both blue and white collar hiring via one network? One platform that handles all data integration? We think that dream makes sense!
hirer.INTRO_TEXT: There are quite a few systems and processes and what is best for your organisation often causes problems with your customers. How do you connect your ideal process for timeregistration and invoice management to their optimization of purchasing? And without the unnecessary costs of custom-made integrations!
hirer.INTRO_TITLE: If you run an employment agency or consultancy firm, you know what we mean
hirer.KIT_INTRO: Digitization in a flash: Standardized connectors make all the difference
hirer.KIT_TEXT: Corporate integration software that has been made equally simple as ordering something like an internet subscription? That was the goal! Born in the cloud, with a natural thought about collaboration, that asks for swift solutioning and that is exactly what you will be getting.
hirer.REGISTER_ACCOUNT: Register now for free and pay only for use

home.HERO_TEXT: One platform where temps agency, flex client, self-employed professional and consulting firm work together on an efficient and transparant process
home.HOME_INTRO: FlexForceMonkey is smart integration software that makes it easier business partners to collaborate in online processes. It ensures a seamless connection between administrations. To show you how we can help, we would like to know what you are looking for. Just click one of the following options to go the relevant website.

newsletter.OPENS_NEW_TAB: Stay up to date? Register now for our newsletter!

subs.INFO1: Ideal for an self-employed person who occasionally assigns his employees and wants an own appearance towards customers
subs.INFO2: Suitable for SMEs with different levels of activity
subs.INFO3: Suitable for SMEs with different levels of activity
subs.INFO4: Infinite upscaling? Contact us about a competitive subscription form or in combination with our customer integration service
subs.INVITEDUNLIMITEDAPPR: You can invite unlimited customers as an approver
subs.SENDINVOICESWEEKMONTH: Send invoices based on timesheets per week or month
subs.TITLE: Online software for timeregistration and invoicing
subs.UNLIMITEDTIMEUSERS: Unlimited timeregistration-users in addition to admin

supplier.AGENCY_SUBTITLE: FlexForceMonkey believes in an online market and thus makes collaborative processing possible for everyone.
supplier.AGENCY_TEXT: The FlexForceMonkey platform connects effortlessly to your processes via SETU messages, but you can also choose to work the timesheets and collective labor calculations manually from CSV files for example. In all cases we ensure that the CAO is set up and you test it together with the customer to make sure you share the insights. Easy online collaboration.
supplier.GET_KIT: Contact us now for your first customer integration
supplier.HERO_TEXT: Stop operations battles on PO numbers and billable hours that do not fit in the labor agreement: join the collaborative flex experience
supplier.INTRO_SUBTITLE: We think bills have to be paid and money has to flow, so when an invoice is based on correct services we simply think it should be set payable without further hassles.
supplier.INTRO_TEXT_1: We see high costs at many temps agencies because invoices from customers come to a stand still in the process. This leads to processing costs to provide release information, but this also generates huge interest costs because money is simply transferred too late.
supplier.KIT_INTRO: Digitization in a flash: Standardized connectors make all the difference
supplier.KIT_TEXT: Corporate integration software that has been made equally simple as ordering something like an internet subscription? That was the goal! Born in the cloud, with a natural thought about collaboration, that asks for swift solutioning and that is exactly what you will be getting.
supplier.PS: PS: have you heard already that working in our online portal is free with a basic subscription?!
supplier.REGISTER_ACCOUNT: Register now for free and pay only for use
